modName: Dark Brotherhood Shrouded Wraps Retexture - Sithis Theme
summary: A retexture of the Dark Brotherhood Shrouded Wraps armour from red to black, with red Daedric lettering.
descriptionHtml:
I didn\'t like the bright red of the Shrouded Wraps so I decided to turn them black and also add some Daedric lettering for a cool effect. The letter is S, for Sithis (the patron deity of the Dark Brotherhood), with another S upside down next to it to make a cool zigzag looking rune effect.

This was my first attempt at retexturing - something very simple but it makes a big difference to my character\'s overall look.

I hope you like it :)

---------------------------------
MANUAL INSTALLATION
---------------------------------
Place the file into your Skyrim folder:
[where your skyrim is installed, then...]/Skyrim/Data/Textures/clothes/robedarkbrotherhood
author: Zac Phoenix
